availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Dorcas Tabitha Stanley Smith in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in November of 1854. Father of Mary A. Smith, Eldon Hamilton Smith, Martha M. Smith, and Nancy Jane Smith. Resident in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 89B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 776.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Precinct 1, p. 11A.

Find A Grave, "Hezekiah Smith (19 Sep 1830-16 Aug 1890)," Memorial #51118796, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/51118796(accessed October 8, 2020).
